description.@value: Rice with green peas, quick and delicious side dish. Not be amiss to submit a side dish with chicken in a spicy-honey marinade. Very tasty, hearty and fast. This dish means a lot and will complement a summer menu in the country.

ingredients.@value:
Figure
                                                    
                                    
                                        Chicken
                                                    
                                    
                                        Green peas
                                                    
                                    
                                        Honey
                                                    
                                    
                                        Soy sauce
                                                    
                                    
                                        Garlic
                                                    
                                    
                                        Black pepper
                                                    
                                    
                                        Paprika sweet
                                                    
                                    
                                        Curry
                                                    
                                    
                                        Ginger
                                                    
                                    
                                        Vegetable oil
                                                    
                                    
                                        Melted butter

name.@value: Rice with green peas and ham

recipeInstructions.@value: Quickly stirring with a whisk, allow to connect the oil with the honey, will appear here such uniform bubbles. Put in pan with chicken legs
Fry until Golden brown, 15-17 minutes, stirring occasionally, over low heat. First, under the lid, then allow to fry.
You can take any part of the chicken, I have chicken legs. Chop them in small pieces, combine with marinade.

Until reaching until tender legs, on a slightly heated pan put the melted butter ( you can take butter and 2 tbsp) green peas. 
Warm up a minute, stirring.

Serve a plate of rice and roasted chicken legs. Serve with a salad of fresh vegetables. 

Bon appetit!

Put on fire a saucepan with 1.5 l of water. When it boils, add salt and throw two bags of rice. 
Put the timer for 25 minutes. 
Mix soy sauce, paprika, pressed garlic, ground dry ginger, curry, pepper.
Heat a little pan, pour vegetable oil 0.5 tbsp, add honey.
Add the rice from the bags, to mix.
Remove rice from boiling water, drain off the water.
